title: Novavax, at long last, clinches FDA emergency nod for protein-based COVID shot
author: Fraiser Kansteiner
description: It's official: A new COVID-19 vaccine will soon be on tap in the U.S. | Late Wednesday, the FDA gave the all-clear to Novavax's protein-based shot, teeing up the nation's fourth pandemic prophylactic behind those from Pfizer-BioNTech, Moderna and Johnson & Johnson.
